result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Keyshawn Lemon

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Keyshawn Lemon appeared by video.  Attorney Haley E Wentz in court for Keyshawn Lemon.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD DUE TO COURT REPORTER AVAILABILITY.
Case in court for pretrial conference.
Defense counsel recently appointed and has received discovery and offer and requests additional time to review. 
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 15.
This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Keyshawn Lemon appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Haley E Wentz appeared by video for Keyshawn Lemon. Attorney Samuel Tyler Tabin appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge J.D. Watts, Branch 15.   Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned to Branch 15 for pretrial conference. This hearing MAY be streamed live on Dacast: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/104d9737-ba2f-8811-9083-aed2135824d9
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
